Attributes.description: Sustainability analysis through a series of case studies. Example approaches include cost-benefit analysis, trade-offs analysis, and life-cycle analysis. Active learning in a computer lab using real-world data.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of ENVR 200, ASIC 220, SCIE 220, GEOG 211. (Third-year standing.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 16:00, Building: Neville, Room: Scarfe
